title: Mike and Nick Play The Cycle and Inside The Backrooms
description:
Yeah, that's right Mike and Nick can't stop exploring Inside The Backrooms so they play an hour of The Cycle and then get the urge to return to Inside The Backrooms for more puzzle solving and scary game fun!
